_header: Water and blood for thee I sweat
Note: First two one quatrain each and third two quatrains.
_description: Christ’s appeal from the cross, in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook — four quatrains (abab), interspersed in Latin sermon

NLS18721.First Lines:
Water & blod for þe i suete& a a þef in an i
                    takeTo loken wan þu woldest leteÞi senne for loue of þi
                    make…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Alle þese moun witnesse bereþat i þe haue
                    wonnen with myn harte
